releases.title: Boxen releases
releases.description: I use Boxen to automate setting up my computers. This widget lists every Puppet module that I use in my Boxen that has a new released version.

github-forks.title: Forks to update
github-forks.description: Shows if any of my GitHub forks' parents have new commits that aren't in my forks.

github-issues.title: GitHub issues
github-issues.description: I compulsively check my issues on GitHub. This widget tracks all issues open on my personal repositories and some organisations for which I am responsible for responding to issues.

github-prs.title: GitHub pull requests
github-prs.description: I compulsively check my pull requests on GitHub. This widget tracks all pull requests open on my personal repositories and some organisations for which I am responsible for responding to pull requests.

travis.title: Travis
travis.description: Monitors the number of failed Travis builds. I use Travis builds to monitor all of my project builds.

gemnasium.title: Gemnasium
gemnasium.description: This widget uses the Gemnasium service to track Ruby gem updates on my projects. If any gems have an update available, this widget will turn orange. If any of those updates are urgent, this widget will turn red.

statuscake.title: Monitoring
statuscake.description: I use StatusCake to monitor uptime on several of my personal and work applications.
